meta.name: description
meta.content: The Ridgewood High School Community creates a stimulating and respectful learning environment which ensures individual students become autonomous leaders in their pursuit of a well-rounded, multi-faceted education grounded in innovation, aspiration, and imagination.

meta.name: keywords
meta.title: Home of the Rebels | Ridgewood High School

div.p: The site navigation utilizes arrow, enter, escape, and space bar key commands. Left and right arrows move across top level links and expand / close menus in sub levels. Up and Down arrows will open main level menus and toggle through sub tier links. Enter and space open menus and escape closes them as well. Tab will move on to the next part of the site rather than go through menu items.

Learn more about Competency Education, the R-Gen Personalized Learning Program as well as how students are connecting real world experiences and math in Geometry In Construction and Algebra 2 In Business.
Learn more about Ridgewood High Schools Competency Based Program
Ridgewood offers 15 sports that compete in the Metro Suburban Conference. Check out the Rebel Athletics team pages for up to date schedules, rosters and results!
